title: Theft of NTLM v2 hash code via Outlook vulnerability (CVE-2023-35636)
description: Showcasing exploitation of the calendar sharing feature in Microsoft Outlook, whereby adding two headers to an email instructs Outlook to share the content and contact a designated machine, creating an opportunity to intercept NTLM v2 hash code.

title: Tackling PXE images
description: Demystifying the nuts and bolts of PXE boot, and explaining how to retrieve and analyze a PXE image to find secrets (such as an AD domain account).

title: LDAP pass back attack
description: Methodology for Active Directory domain accounts takeover through LDAP pass back attack on printers.

title: Kirby < 3.9.6 XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability â€” CVE-2023-38490
description: Detailed write-up about an XXE on Kirby CMS (CVE-2023-38490).

title: GraphQL for Pentesters
description: Introducing GraphQL security for penetration tests: basic concepts, security considerations & reconnaissance, vulnerabilities and attacks, offensive tools.

title: Whatâ€™s new in ffuf 2.0 release?
description: Covers new features in ffuf 2.0: scrapper, request backtracking, configuration supporting XDG_CONFIG_HOME.

title: ffuf advanced tricks
description: Covers advanced use case of ffuf: the configuration file, reading from standard input, avoiding false negatives with match all and filtering with regexp, use of external payload mutators.

title: Transform P3 P4 P5 vulnerabilities to P1
description: How to steal user sessions by chaining low risk vulnerabilities.

title: Cracking encrypted archives (PKZIP: Zip ZipCrypto, Winzip: Zip AES, 7 Zip, RAR)
description: Biham and Kocher plaintext attack on ZipCrypto Zip and wordlist attack on Zip, 7-zip and RAR.

title: Ruby 3.2.0 Preview 1 : vivre dans le futur
description: Overview of the new features that will come in Ruby 3.2.0: WebAssembly (WASM / WASI), ReDoS protection, Unicode v14.

title: Attaques Unicode - Rump BreizhCTF 2k22
description: Case transformation collision and Hostname splitting Unicode attacks.

title: Some sudo elevation of privilege vulnerabilities
description: An introduction to 3 sudo vulnerabilities: CVE-2019-14287, CVE-2019-18634, CVE-2021-3156.

title: Security.txt | Progress in Ethical Security Research
description: This article looks to answer the question of how widely adopted security.txt has become, 3 years on from when it was first drafted.

title: SSH Pentesting Guide
description: A Comprehensive Guide to Breaking SSH.

title: Overview of network pivoting and tunneling
description: State of the art of network pivoting, this paper covers several pivoting techniques as well as the existing tools to perform a lateral move.
